Occupation History:
Richard Robin Lambert is a 47 year old Luxury Brand Owner from France. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.

At Hermès International S.A., he held the position of Senior Designer from 2005 to 2008, making significant contributions to the organization.
His tenure as a Creative Director at Hermès International S.A. from 2010 to 2013 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
His next role was as a Founder/Designer at Hermès International S.A., where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 2015 to 2020.
Since joining Louis Vuitton Malletier S.A. as a Luxury Brand Owner in 2021, he has established himself as a respected authority, fostering collaboration and pushing boundaries to achieve groundbreaking results.
